author: Simon Difford
description: Mastiha adds a distinctively Greek fresh flavour to this otherwise fairly classic mojito.
name: Mastiha Mojito
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more
Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass
